mapper.insert: insert into mkt_questionnaire (NAIRE_ID, NAIRE_NAME, NAIRE_TYPE, MARK_TYPE, NAIRE_POINTS, NAIRE_DESC, START_TIP, END_TIP, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK ) values (#{naireId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{naireName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{naireType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{markType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nairePoints,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{naireDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update mkt_questionnaire set NAIRE_NAME = #{naireName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAIRE_TYPE = #{naireType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARK_TYPE = #{markType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAIRE_POINTS = #{nairePoints,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAIRE_DESC = #{naireDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIP = #{startTip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_TIP = #{endTip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where NAIRE_ID = #{naireId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select NAIRE_ID, NAIRE_NAME, NAIRE_TYPE, MARK_TYPE, NAIRE_POINTS, NAIRE_DESC, START_TIP, END_TIP, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_questionnaire where NAIRE_ID = #{naireId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select NAIRE_ID, NAIRE_NAME, NAIRE_TYPE, MARK_TYPE, NAIRE_POINTS, NAIRE_DESC, START_TIP, END_TIP, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from mkt_questionnaire
